content: fall in love with the deep dreamy tones of this supremely cushy crochet blanket uniquely shaped using bernat blanket this throw works up quickly with basic stitches like single_crochet slip_stitch double_crochet half_double_crochet and more keep it richly designed or choose a color that agrees with your aesthetic the unexpected design ensures a blanket that s as beautiful as it is out-of-this-world comfortable materials bernat® blanket™ 35 3 oz/1000 g 733 yds/670 m interstellar indigo 33001 3 balls measurement approx 58 147 5 cm wide from point to point
